name: Narcolepsy
description:
Created specifically for #GMTKJam 2020.

A short horror game about a kid who got lost in the woods and has narcolepsy.

Enemies do not attack you while you are awake.

The problem is, the character falls asleep from time to time.

Get out of the forest and come home unharmed.

What is narcolepsy?

Narcolepsy is a long-term neurological disorder that involves a decreased ability to regulate sleep-wake cycles. Symptoms often include periods of excessive daytime sleepiness and brief involuntary sleep episodes.

Controls

A and D to move.

Use mouse to kill enemies.

Tips and Tricks

If the game is too difficult for you, try not to rush. Monsters at a huge distance smell when you sleep, maybe they will come to you themselves?

 Everything in this game was made during the 48 hours.
